scripts.dev: concurrently -r "cd backend && npm run develop" "cd frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.build: rm -r ./dist && mkdir ./dist && concurrently -r "cd backend && npm run build && mv ./build ../dist/admin" "cd frontend && npm run build -- --outDir=../dist"
scripts.setup: concurrently -r "cd backend && npm i" "cd frontend && npm i"
